def update_awesomeness(arr, i, x, curr_aws):
    n = len(arr)
    old_val = arr[i]
    delta = 0

    # Check left transition (i-1 and i)

            delta -= i * (n - i)
    # Check right transition (i and i+1)
    if i < n-1:
        if old_val != arr[i+1]:
            delta -= (i+1) * (n - (i+1))

    # Now set the new value
    arr[i] = x

    # Check new left transition
    if i > 0:
        if arr[i-1] != x:
            delta += i * (n - i)
    # Check new right transition
    if i < n-1:
        if x != arr[i+1]:
            delta += (i+1) * (n - (i+1))

    return curr_aws + delta
